CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND(
ISPICKVAL(Charge_Type__c, 'PSF'), ISPICKVAL(Calculation_Area_Type__c, 'Saleable Area')), Charge_Rate__c* Unit__r.Saleable_Area__c ,
IF(
AND(
ISPICKVAL(Charge_Type__c, 'PSF'), ISPICKVAL(Calculation_Area_Type__c, 'Carpet Area')), Charge_Rate__c* Unit__r.Total_carpet_Sq_Ft__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Charge_Type__c, 'Lumpsum')),Charge_Amount__c,0)
) )
CustomField.label: Actual Cost
